entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
